units.name: Lens
units.prompt: Use foresight to reveal enemy positions and cloaked units. Stay at max range. Use mind_spike on the highest-threat target. Keep distance from enemies.

units.name: Warden
units.prompt: Advance toward the nearest enemy. Use shield_wall facing the direction with the most enemies. If an enemy is adjacent, attack them.

units.name: Doc
units.prompt: Prioritize healing the lowest HP ally. Position safely behind your sentinel. Use overclock on allies who can do the most with an extra action.

player.placementPrompt: Cluster near the center for mutual support. Front-liner forward, others one row back.

units.name: Patch
units.prompt: Stay adjacent to the most threatened ally. Use patch on the most wounded teammate. If all healthy, use overclock on your damage dealer.

units.name: Insight
units.prompt: Scan the battlefield with foresight each turn. Focus mind_spike on wounded enemies to secure kills. Stay behind allies and maintain range.

units.name: Longshot
units.prompt: Position for clear sight lines. Prioritize killing wounded enemies with precision_shot. If forced to move, retreat away from threats. Suppressing_fire to slow rushers.

opponent.placementPrompt: Place the tankiest unit center front. Ranged units in the back. Flankers on the edges.
